Question: Sky Light Imaging Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Sky Light Imaging Limited

Product: CES 2024 Camera Kit

- Sony A1 II, A7S IV, FX3 II, ZV-E10 II
- Panasonic S1R II, S1H II, GH7
- Canon EOS R1, EOS R5 II, concept cameras
- Nikon Z6 III, Z9H
- Fujifilm X100V, Instax Mini 99

CES 2024 is set to feature new cameras and imaging tech from major brands including Sony, Panasonic, Canon, Nikon, and Fujifilm. Sony is expected to announce several cameras with headline video capabilities, while Panasonic may reveal replacements for S1 / S1R, S1H, and GH6. Canon is anticipated to launch the highly awaited EOS R1 and other concept cameras. Nikon could showcase Z6 III and Z9H, and Fujifilm might unveil X100V and Instax Mini 99. These announcements are expected to focus on video capabilities and advancements in imaging technology.
